entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider‚Ñ¢
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫829,00 Ôºâ

Application Description

Discover the legend within. Before you buy, please expand this description and check that your computer matches or exceeds each of the requirements listed. In the breathtaking sequel to Tomb Raider, Lara Croft becomes more than a survivor as she embarks upon her first great expedition to explore the earth‚Äôs most ancient and remote regions and uncover the secret of immortality. Harness Lara‚Äôs growing talents in a dramatic action-adventure ranging from Syria‚Äôs sun-baked ruins to Siberia‚Äôs frozen mountains. Play as the young archaeologist as she conquers tombs, outpaces rivals, and establishes her legend. THE COMPLETE ADVENTURE Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration equips the base game with its entire collection of DLC. Uncover the secrets of Croft Manor in Blood Ties, find the truth behind a mythic terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, prevent a lethal outbreak in Cold Darkness, and face waves of supernatural enemies in Lara‚Äôs Nightmare. In Endurance Mode, survive the harsh Siberian wilderness alone or co-operatively with another player. Important information regarding Rise of the Tomb Raider: The game is officially supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar. ‚ó¶ All 13" MacBook Pros released since 2016 ‚ó¶ All 15" MacBook Pros released since Late 2013 with a 2.3GHz processor or better ‚ó¶ All 21.5" iMacs released since 2017 ‚ó¶ All 27" iMacs released since Late 2013 (models with an Nvidia GT 755M graphics card are not officially supported) (1) ‚ó¶ All Mac Pros released since Late 2013 (1) Late 2012 models with a 2GB Nvidia 680MX graphics card are also supported. The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support. ‚ó¶ All 15" MacBook Pros released since Late 2013 ‚ó¶ All 21.5" iMacs released since Late 2013 with a 2.3GHz processor or better (models with an Nvidia 750M graphics card are not supported). ‚Ä¢ Minimum System Requirements: ‚ó¶ Processor: 2.3GHz ‚ó¶ RAM: 8GB ‚ó¶ Graphics: 1.5GB ‚ó¶ macOS: 10.13.4 ‚ó¶ Free Space: 36GB Check the Feral website for more detailed specifications. ‚Ä¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com ‚Ä¢ Supports over 100 different models of gamepad. For a full list check the Feral support site. ‚Ä¢ This game is not currently supported on volumes formatted as Case-sensitive. ‚Ä¢ You can find out more about the game on the Rise of the Tomb Raider mini-site at feralinteractive.com/riseofthetombraider RISE OF THE TOMB RAIDER ¬© 2018 Square Enix Ltd. All Rights Reserved. RISE OF THE TOMB RAIDER, TOMB RAIDER, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, the CRYSTAL DYNAMICS logo, EIDOS, the EIDOS logo and LARA CROFT are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Ltd. SQUARE ENIX and the SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd. Developed for and published on macOS by Feral Interactive Ltd. In the spectacular action-adventure puzzle game and thrilling finale to the Tomb Raider origins trilogy, Lara Croft must save the world from a Mayan apocalypse and shape her destiny to become the Tomb Raider. entry.title: Safety Note+ Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Introducing Safety Note+: Keep Your Most Private Notes Secure Have you ever experienced the frustration of lending someone your phone, only to have them intrude on your personal information? We understand the discomfort that comes with it. That's why we created Safety Note+. With this powerful app, you can now safeguard your private notes from unauthorized access effortlessly. Key Features: ‚Ä¢ Advanced security system: Utilizing state-of-the-art technology to protect your notes ‚Ä¢ Passcode protection: Quickly and easily secure your most private and sensitive notes with a passcode only known to you ‚Ä¢ Biometric support: Unlock the app using TouchID or FaceID for added convenience ‚Ä¢ Intruder report: Capture photos of unauthorized individuals attempting to access your app ‚Ä¢ Decoy password: Conceal your real privacy with a decoy password ‚Ä¢ Folder-specific passcode locking: Enhance security by applying passcode protection to individual folders ‚Ä¢ Dot pattern lock style: Opt for a higher level of security with the dot pattern lock style ‚Ä¢ Multiple lock designs: Choose from three stylish and user-friendly lock designs without compromising security ‚Ä¢ Intuitive interface: Selectable themes and an easy-to-use interface make managing your notes a breeze ‚Ä¢ Note organization: Create, sort, move, and copy notes within folders ‚Ä¢ Backup and sharing options: Back up notes to your computer via iTunes file sharing or iCloud, and share notes between iOS devices with Safety Note+ installed via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi ‚Ä¢ Additional features: Auto-save, note search, email notes, and full orientation support ‚Ä¢ Universal compatibility: Developed for both iPhone and iPad, requiring a single purchase Your privacy matters. With Safety Note+, you can confidently secure your personal information. Customize your passcode style, protect individual folders, and experience the peace of mind that comes with complete control over your private notes. Download Safety Note+ now and ensure that what goes into Safety Note+ remains for your eyes only. Visit us at: Website: https://sixbytes.io Twitter: https://twitter.com/SixbytesApp Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sixbytesapp For more information, please refer to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: Terms of service: https://sixbytes.io/assets/terms-of-service.pdf Privacy policy: https://sixbytes.io/assets/privacy-policy.pdf

entry.title: FocusDots ¬∑ Focus What Matters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

Application Screenshot

iPad
